name: Hour In Hell
description:
This is my very first horror game created using unity engine. I'm not a professional game developer this is just a stepping stone for me to be a good at it.   The story of this game is about a man trapped in hell because of his deadly sin. He wants to get his soul back so he jumps down to the underworld. He was given 60 minutes of time to look for the pattern traverse the maze and get the key to open the gate of "Domus Animarum".   

Controls: 

WASD - MOVE  

MOUSE- CAMERA MOVEMENT  

SPACE BAR - JUMP  

If you have any suggestion or feedback feel free to comment. I hope you enjoy my game. Thank you!  

Support me and become a patron.

https://www.patreon.com/EXOUL05

-EXOUL
